Text: File corrupt?  Locks up MPC-HC, MPC, Win Media Player, etc about 67 seconds from the start... no trouble playing any other WMVs just this one.
It plays ok for me. That's how I was able to take screenshots.

Thanks and Ok, BUT that it played fine when you took screens is not evidence it is still ok now.  It passed the checksum from the torrent file/client so I suspect it got corrupt before that was calculated.

Might be a problem on my end instead, I'm just saying I have no trouble playing any other videos but with this one, all players lock at the same exact point in the video.
